name: Soul Slayer
description:
Soul Slayer is a browser game inspired by the famous anime Demon Slayer.

In Soul Slayer, you are attacked by evil souls that want to kill you and corrupt your soul to become one of them, so you will have to defend yourself and kill every one of them that's coming at you. The game features perks and abilities that will help you progress the game faster and stay alive for longer, as well as customizable background and levels.

Controls:

W, A, S, D to move; mouse to slash.
